ml_tags: "Forever Always, Always Forever" 02/07/1940 ~ 20/04/2022 Arrondale Monkley You were the first man I ever loved You loved & cherished me. You raised & sheltered me, Dear Poppy, now I have to give you back. God gifted you to me & love Darlean. This is my last letter to you... & ill see you in my dreams. ill forever always be your baby I know I was selfish to want to keep you here but & I love you always & forever You were the first man I gave my heart too & when you left me you took my heart with you. no more aches and pains now so sleep in peace poppy
